briefdescription.para: Get number of items.
Insert an item into a array at a specified position.
Add an item to the end of a array.
Remove item at a specified position.
Remove all items.
Search item, returns the position of the first occurrence in array or ITEM_NONE if item not found.
Get index of selected item (ITEM_NONE if none selected).
Select specified _index.
Clear item selection.
Replace an item data at a specified position.
Clear an item data at a specified position.
Get item data from specified position.
Replace an item name at a specified position.
Get item name from specified position.
Move all elements so specified becomes visible.
Move all elements so first becomes visible.
Move all elements so last becomes visible.
Move all elements so selected becomes visible.
Set drop list mode (text can not be edited).
Get drop list mode flag.
Set smooth show of list.
Get smooth show of list flag.
Get max list length.
Set max list length.
Set direction, where drop down list appears (TopToBottom by default).
Get direction, where drop down list appears.

detaileddescription.para:
Event : Enter pressed in combo mode or item selected in drop down list and combo mode drop enabled (see void ComboBox::setComboModeDrop(bool _value)). signature : void method(MyGUI::ComboBox* _sender, size_t _index)
_sender
widget that called this event
_index
item

Event : Position changed. signature : void method(MyGUI::ComboBox* _sender, size_t _index)
_sender
widget that called this event
_index
of new position

briefdescription.para: {ComboBox} ComboBox widget description should be here.
